Click to close Click to open To setting How to setß Already open Already close Already close not open not close I want to close I want to open Set up successfully!
Turn off the power optimization of this app to ensure that the notification bright screen is valid before the phone is restarted.
Take the Samsung mobile phone as an example. The shutdown method is as follows:
1. Open settings
2. Search "Optimize battery usage"
3. Click to enter "Optimize battery usage"
4. Search for "Notification Bright Screen"
5. Set the button to "unchecked"

Note: Please turn off [Disable Screen Reminder] for Samsung mobile phone or set it to "Click to display"
Turning notification on or off will take 1~10 seconds to take effect.
 Please wait patiently.
Developing Read notification permission Background Services Bright screen time Turn off power optimization Pocket Mode Optimize Ongoing Notify Current Mode All Notify Whitelist mode Whitelist Setting Page Blacklist mode Blacklist Setting Page Open Source Project Feedback Debug Mode Debug Page Click here to enter Debug Page Click here to enter Whitelist Page Click here to enter Blacklist Page When debugging mode is opened
the page will display the name of the APP package corresponding to all notifications received
. If an unexpected situation occurs 
such as an abnormal light on the screen
please take a screenshot of the page and contact the author to solve it

The screen will only wake up when it receives a notification from selected apps.
The screen will not wake up when it receives a nofification from selected apps
Custom About Debug Advanced Setting About Wake Up Screen App Info Info App Intro Five-star rate Click here to open Google Play Store
This is an Android app that allows the phone to wake up when it receives a notification.
Specially for Samsung S10 optimization. Also compatible with other devices.
It's open source, no internet access, and free. "The screen will not wake between " Sleep Mode Click here to begin wake test Click here and press power button within 5 seconds Sleep Time Detection of Do Not Disturb Close it if you want to wake up in DND mode. Italiano The screen will wake second(s) Notice: 
In many Devices, this setting will not work properly. 
This is a limitation by the system.
